full_summary:
**Extension Repairs on The Koshkawong Barrier and Trap**
==============================================

**Reference:** cb-535-9425337

**Amendment Notice:** 5

**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-02-09, 14:00:00

**Publication Date:** 2024-01-24

**Procurement Category:** *Construction Services*

**Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Region of Opportunity:** *Canada*

**Region of Delivery:** *Ontario (except National Capital Region)*

**Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-06-24

**Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-09-30

**Notice Type:** Invitation to Qualify

**Tender Status:** Expiré (Expired)

**Bid Number:** 30005378

### Tender Description

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans invites you to tender for extension repair services on the Koshkawong Barrier and Trap located on St Joseph Island, Ontario.

The scope of this project includes:

*Creating a detailed repair design to improve the structural integrity of the concrete structure, sea lamprey lip, and jump pool modifications to enhance fish passage.
*Implementing the detailed repair design to extend the life of the Koshkawong barrier.

### Tender Documents

* [RFQ (Request for Qualification) Phase 1 - English] {https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30243/30005378---phase-1---rfq-en-final.pdf}
* [RFQ (Request for Qualification) Phase 1 - French] {https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30243/30005378---phase-1---rfq-fr-final.pdf}
* [Addendum 1 - English] {https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30243/30005378-addendum-1---addenda-no-1.pdf}
* [Addendum 1 - French] {https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30243/30005378-addendum-1---addenda-no-1.pdf}

### Contact Information

* Name: Dina Al-Eryani
* Email: [Dina.Al-Eryani@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:Dina.Al-Eryani@dfo-
